name: Me vs Zombies
description:
Fight and find a way out of this zombies ridden  maze !

Me VS Zombie is a third person game developed as a prototype for my university project. 

This prototype include basic element of third person shooter including third person camera/ character movement, AI navigation and item interaction

Control

  • WASD to walk
  • Mouse click to fire 
  • R to reload
  • Shift to dodge roll
  • E to interact
